The project will feature 10-15 artists who work with landscape. The project will look to address ways landscape is used to address environmental, psychological or political concerns.

The special edition issue due out in fall 2019 will travel to art fairs around the globe including Frieze London, Pulse Miami, Art Basel Miami, Artissima, Art Fair Tokyo, London Art Fair, The Armory Show, Zona Maco Mexico, Art Paris and more,

To be considered for the project, please send 3-5 (low res) JPEG images of your work, a short bio/cv and links to your website (email to: vellumartzine@gmail.com) by July 1, 2019.
